item.description:
FRIDAY  JULY 13 -Swinging On A Star: Johnny Burke Musical with the
Connecticut Theatre Group- Pre Party Dinner and Drinks & Afterparty

Swinging On A Star: The Johnny Burke Musical with The Connecticut Theatre Group Pre-Party Dinner and After Party*ADV TIX DISCOUNT*

Based on the fabulous lyrics of Johnny Burke, this "dazzling, toe-tapping, finger-snapping delight" of a musical revue features over 40 tunes: including such classics as "Pennies From Heaven," "What's New," "Imagination," "Misty," "Here's That Rainy Day," and Academy Award-winning "Swinging on a Star."

The songs, performed by seven singer/actor/dancers, are perfectly woven into scenes and settings, including a 1920's speakeasy, a World War II USO tour and a Paramount pictures studio where Bob Hope and Bing Crosby are filming their "Road Show" pictures.

"Johnny Burke wrote his songs with moonbeams! Songs poured out of him like life-renewing raindrops, glinting like pennies." —NY Times.

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Pre-Party starts at 6:30pm - Show starts at 8pm

FREE SAFE PARKING

Advance Tickets are $25 * Tickets are $32.50 at the event

PLUS: FREE wine and Cheese Party at Playhouse on Park

Playhouse on Park
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119

EXIT 43 PARK ROAD off 84

Next to AC Petersons

Pick up your ticket before the show at the pre-Party with the Connecticut Theatre Group, or at the will call window

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP SECTION * THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Visit http://www.CTTheatre.org or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your ticket before the show at the PREPARTY with the Connecticut Theatre Group, or at the ticket window
